sentences.en: About the novel, many people overemphasize its objective factors while neglecting the subjective consciousness.
sentences.cn: 对卡夫卡的《变形记》, 许多论者大都过分强调外在客观因素,而忽视了其内在主体意识.

sentences.en: I can't overemphasize the cleanliness of this place.
sentences.cn: 这个地方的清洁我再怎么说都不为过。

sentences.en: I cannot overemphasize the importance of this book.
sentences.cn: 我不会过分强调这本书的重要性.

sentences.en: In the past the exam had been overemphasized.
sentences.cn: 过去，考试受到了过分的重视。

sentences.en: It's inadvisable to overemphasize this point.
One tends to overemphasize short - term payoffs and ignores long - term strength.
sentences.cn: 人们追求立竿见影的效果,忽视 长期 的利益.

sentences.en: The importance of adequate preparation cannot be overemphasized (= used to say that something is very important ).
sentences.cn: 做好充足准备的重要性怎么强调也不过分。

sentences.en: The overemphasize of quantity of papers does have negative effect on research.
sentences.cn: 过份重视文章的数量,对研究有负面的效果.

words.tran_cn: 过分打扮的；穿着过于讲究的
使过分激动或兴奋（overexcite的过去式）
穿得过分讲究；穿得过多
过分夸大；过分戏剧性地表达
过度装饰；使穿著过分讲究
过分扩展；过分延长；使…承担过多的义务

trans.tran_en: to give something more importance than it deserves or than is suitable
